instructions:
Melt margarine in top of double boiler and stir in flour. Gradually stir in milk and cook for about 3
minutes or until it thickens. Stir in mustard, Worcestershire, salt and pepper. Add cheeses and stir until
melted. If necessary, add a small amount of milk or Velveta to arrive at desired thickness of sauce. Makes
about 1 cup of sauce.
Pour over your favorite parboiled vegetable, broccoli or cauliflower *(3 min)*, cabbage wedges *(8 min)*, or
small white onions *(5 min)* and brown as a casserole under the broiler.
ingredients: 1/2 inch slice Velveta cheese, in chunks
name: Cheese Sauce For Vegetables
